original_text: The king of Egypt did not take his army out of his own country again. That was because the king of Babylon had taken a lot of Egypt's land for himself. He had taken all the land between the Stream of Egypt and the River Euphrates. Before that, the king of Egypt had authority over that land.
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 다시는 그 나라에서 나오지 못하였으니 이는 바벨론 왕이 애굽 강에서부터 유브라데 강까지 애굽 왕에게 속한 땅을 다 점령하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: The king of Egypt did not take his army out of his own country again
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 왕은 다시는 자기 나라에서 군대를 이끌고 나가지 않았다

sentences.original_text: That was because the king of Babylon had taken a lot of Egypt's land for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 바빌론 왕이 이집트의 땅 많은 부분을 자기 것으로 차지했기 때문이었다

sentences.original_text: He had taken all the land between the Stream of Egypt and the River Euphrates
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이집트 강과 유프라테스 강 사이의 모든 땅을 차지했다

sentences.original_text: Before that, the king of Egypt had authority over that land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에는, 이집트 왕이 그 땅에 대한 권위를 가지고 있었다
